column1: SOURCE bank_txn SINK irs_form CONSTRAINT count(distinct bank_txn.txn_id) = 1 ON FAIL REMOVE
SOURCE bank_txn SINK irs_form CONSTRAINT min(bank_txn.txn_id) = irs_form.txn_id ON FAIL REMOVE
SOURCE bank_txn SINK irs_form CONSTRAINT not lower(min(bank_txn.category)) = 'meal' or irs_form.business_use_pct <= 50.0 ON FAIL LLM
